column4: ok i'm trying to install the ati drivers and the command is "sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules-<your-kernel-version> xorg-driver-fglrx" but i don't know what to put in for the kernel version

ok i'm trying to install the ati drivers and the command is "sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules-<your-kernel-version> xorg-driver-fglrx" but i don't know what to put in for the kernel version
use syanptic, it will do it for you
